visualize¶

plot_times(timed: List[tuple]):

Plot passed in data as bar graphs. Each list in ‘times’ should follow the format [([data_1], data_1_name), ([data_2], data_2_name), …]

Parameters

times – List of tuples to be unpacked

Returns

None

generate_bar_plot(data: list, title: str)¶

Generates a bar plot of ‘data’ with title ‘title’

Params data

Data to be plotted

Params title

Desired plot title

Returns

None, but saves the plots in stats/plots
